header.class: elcreative_header fixed top-0 z-50 flex min-h-[75px] w-full flex-col items-center justify-center border-b border-b-[#000] bg-[#ffc017] px-4 xl:px-0

div.class: mx-auto flex w-full max-w-6xl items-center justify-between

b:section.class: section_app_bar flex items-center justify-start ltr:mr-2 rtl:ml-2
b:section.name: Header Logo and Title

b:section.class: section_navigation flex items-center justify-end ltr:ml-2 rtl:mr-2
b:section.name: Main Menu

div.class: elcreative_container mx-auto flex w-full max-w-6xl flex-col justify-between px-4 pb-4 pt-28 xl:pt-32 lg:flex-row xl:px-0 xl:pb-5
